author: Cameron McWhirter
title: Some Georgia Republicans Seek to Punish Delta for Change on NRA Discounts
text:
ATLANTA—Delta Air Lines Inc. has triggered a fight among Republicans in its home state of Georgia after it ended some discounted rates for National Rifle Association members following the deadly Florida school shooting earlier this month.
Republican Lt. Gov. Casey Cagle, who heads the state Senate and is a leading candidate for governor this year, has threatened to block a GOP-sponsored bill that would provide tax breaks on jet fuel that benefit Delta, metro Atlanta’s largest employer.
... We look back over the events that unfolded during the deadliest school shooting since Sandy Hook in 2012. Photo: Zuma Press
